experience.title: Corporate and public relations member
experience.description: TeamKART is the official FSAE team of IIT Kharagpur. The Corporate and Public Relations team works together to seek collaboration with corporate companies. My work included – • Developing fundraising strategies and networking with university alumni.• Preparing articles, blog posts, posters, photos for conducting workshops in different colleges.• Building and maintaining corporate relations with companies • Facilitating the recruitment and training process of new members.• Maintaining the team spirit and unity among the team members to ensure maximum work efficiency and best results.• Organizing the introductory seminar and various workshops for over 600 college students.• Conducting regular team meetings and brainstorming sessions to ensure active participation by team members.

projects: [{"title":"Aiming growth paradox (Is exponential growth beneficial in long term?)","start_date":"Feb 2019","end_date":"Mar 2019","description":"Businesses see growth as a good thing. The more and the faster a business can grow, the better, right? Not necessarily. In order for a business to grow and not run into problems with financing, it has to grow at an optimal growth rate. This project cites several examples with the use of graphs, numbers, and tables to explain why a runaway growth can lead to doom. It also includes the steps that must be undertaken to avert this disaster."},{"title":"Business Logic Presentation","start_date":"Nov 2018","end_date":"Jan 2019","description":"Presenting our business plans (present as well as future), exit strategies etc. in front of investors."}]
